pageContext.claim: “By the way, he [Soleimani] was in a country he wasn't allowed to be in. We don't mention that because he was designated and he wasn't allowed to be there. And he was there with the head of Hezbollah, and they were talking about, like Hillary Clinton. They were talking about weddings and working out. Soleimani and the head of Hezbollah, they were talking about weddings, working out.”
pageContext.analysis: Before his death, Soleimani was met at Baghdad airport by Iraqi paramilitary leader Abu Mahdi al-Muhandis, the head of Kata'ib Hezbollah. That is a completely different group from the Lebanese militant group and political party, Hezbollah, led by Hassan Nasrallah.
